name: TAF plugin
author: Luther Blissett

sections.description:
TAF-widget lets you enter an ICAO station (airport) in the widget admin and will display the according TAF code as widget on your wordpress site.
The TAF data used is provided by NOAA.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip taf-widget.zip
  2. Upload the taf-widget folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on the server
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Place the taf-widget in the wordpress admin interface
  5. Enter an ICAO code for the respective airport (e.g. OMDB for Dubai, United Arab Emirates or VTSR for Siem Reap, Cambodia)
sections.faq:
What is TAF?

TAF is a format for reporting weather forecast information. A TAF weather report is predominantly used by pilots in fulfillment of a part of a pre-flight weather briefing, and by meteorologists, who use aggregated METAR and TAF information to assist in weather forecasting.

short_description: A simple widget to display the current TAF (Terminal aerodrome forecast) code for a chosen ICAO station.
description:
TAF-widget lets you enter an ICAO station (airport) in the widget admin and will display the according TAF code as widget on your wordpress site.
The TAF data used is provided by NOAA.
